00019 #ifndef _MASHSTEPTABLEMODEL_H
00020 #define _MASHSTEPTABLEMODEL_H
00021 
00022 class MashStepTableModel;
00023 class MashStepItemDelegate;
00024 
00025 #include <QAbstractTableModel>
00026 #include <QWidget>
00027 #include <QModelIndex>
00028 #include <QVariant>
00029 #include <Qt>
00030 #include <QItemDelegate>
00031 #include <vector>
00032 #include "mashstep.h"
00033 #include "observable.h"
00034 #include "MashStepTableWidget.h"
00035 
00036 enum{ MASHSTEPNAMECOL, MASHSTEPTYPECOL, MASHSTEPAMOUNTCOL, MASHSTEPTEMPCOL, MASHSTEPTIMECOL, MASHSTEPNUMCOLS /*This one MUST be last*/};
00037 
00038 class MashStepTableModel : public QAbstractTableModel, public MultipleObserver
00039 {
00040    Q_OBJECT
00041 
00042 public:
00043    MashStepTableModel(MashStepTableWidget* parent=0);
00044    void addMashStep(MashStep* step);
00045    bool removeMashStep(MashStep* step); // Returns true if "step" is successfully found and removed.
00046    void removeAll();
00047    virtual void notify(Observable* notifier); // Inherited from Observer via MultipleObserver.
00048 
00049    // Inherit the following from QAbstractItemModel via QAbstractTableModel
00050    virtual int rowCount(const QModelIndex& parent = QModelIndex()) const;
00051    virtual int columnCount(const QModelIndex& parent = QModelIndex()) const;
00052    virtual QVariant data( const QModelIndex& index, int role = Qt::DisplayRole ) const;
00053    virtual QVariant headerData( int section, Qt::Orientation orientation, int role = Qt::DisplayRole ) const;
00054    virtual Qt::ItemFlags flags(const QModelIndex& index ) const;
00055    virtual bool setData( const QModelIndex& index, const QVariant& value, int role = Qt::EditRole );
00056 
00057 private:
00058    std::vector<MashStep*> stepObs;
00059    MashStepTableWidget* parentTableWidget;
00060 };
00061 
00062 class MashStepItemDelegate : public QItemDelegate
00063 {
00064    Q_OBJECT
00065 
00066 public:
00067    MashStepItemDelegate(QObject* parent = 0);
00068 
00069    // Inherited functions.
00070    virtual QWidget *createEditor(QWidget *parent, const QStyleOptionViewItem &option, const QModelIndex &index) const;
00071    virtual void setEditorData(QWidget *editor, const QModelIndex &index) const;
00072    virtual void setModelData(QWidget *editor, QAbstractItemModel *model, const QModelIndex &index) const;
00073    virtual void updateEditorGeometry(QWidget *editor, const QStyleOptionViewItem &option, const QModelIndex &index) const;
00074 
00075 private:
00076 };
00077 
00078 #endif  /* _MASHSTEPTABLEMODEL_H */
